content: *this washcloth / dishcloth is a great beginner project it is so much nicer and thicker than store-bought dishrags lion brand yarn * skill level beginner level 1 lion® cotton article #760 1 ball *one ball makes several dishcloths* knitting needles - size 7 4 5 mm worked in 4-row reversible pattern also available at dishcloth boutique archived link kitchen cotton dishcloth 1 see ravelry dish cloth crochet 2 for the crochet version 1 https //web archive org/web/20140813010012/http //groupepp com/dishbout/kpatterns/kitcottn html 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dish-cloth-crochet-ckc-dishcloths
